channel.title: Village upgrades
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Village upgrades"

item.title: Re: Village upgrades
item.content:encoded: If you are referring to the Party House, Banker and Collection Squad, they maintain their functionality even if there are no active players in the villageâ€¦though probably not for long as the village will be deleted :-)

item.title: Re: Village upgrades
item.content:encoded:
Most of them are updated, just the new upgrades of when you start a village that say 0, I have no clue about them.

P.S my Karma Level went up from that

item.title: Re: Village upgrades
item.content:encoded:
That was really needed. Good job on that task.
I wish you luck with the village size so that you can update all of them.

item.title: Village upgrades
item.content:encoded:
I just thought I'd let everyone know I updated almost all non- NRF upgrades to show
Village Size Needed to Buy
Village Size Needed to Maintain

most of them were just set to show how many it took to maintain
